titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [18. 10. 1946]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 223).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I am very sorry I shan't be able to see you this afternoon. I have been looking forward to it; but I have a slight cold & a) I might give it to you b) I have to do everything to enable me to give a moderate lecture tomorrow. I feel, my lectures are hanging on a thin thread.
Would it be all right if I came to see you next Thursday? I hope your health is improving.
